DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, open-label, crossover study to examine the bioavailability of pramlintide in normal weight and overweight subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes mellitus using insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Bioavailability of Pramlintide
DOC.criteria: HbA1c value between 612% BMI <= 27 kg/m2 or BMI >=30 to <= 45 kg/m2 Consistent insulin regimen for 2 months prior to screening
